title: Johnson says Congress will investigate attacks against Tesla owners, vehicles
summary: House Speaker Mike Johnson announced a congressional investigation into alleged attacks against Tesla owners and vehicles, framing it as “domestic terrorism” orchestrated by the “radical Left”
